name: Wrestling Manager 2023
description:
Wrestling Manager 2023 is an easy-to-use game where you manage a wrestling company, and bring it to the top!

Main Features:
*Book shows
Make the crowd be on their feet!

*Manage workers
Keep them happy and safe!

*Build PPV Cards
Create matches for a PPV, and build status around them!

*Create stables
Make groups of workers wrestle together!

*Hire new workers
Get workers from rivalry companies or the wrestling development!

*Create new Championships
Introduce new gold to your company!

*Customize your workers
With many customizables you can make your workers outfit in many different ways!

*Promises
Make and keep promises made with your workers!

*Get earnings from merchandises
Earn money by selling your wrestler's merchandise!

*Create Roster Pack
Make your own roster pack, including workers, companies, championships, shows and so on...
